text: Victor Zsasz is a fictional Batman character from the DC Comics universe who is a serial killer in Gotham City. He has the number of people he had killed written in tally marks on his skin. He uses a pocket knife to kill. He was killed by an anarchist Heat Wave. == In other media == He was played by Tim Booth in Batman Begins and will be played by Chris Messina in Birds of Prey (2020). Category:Batman characters Category:DC Comics characters Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1992
title: Victor Zsasz
